attributes.title: You are Divinity || Part 4 || Shiva Sutras || 09 March 2006
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Shiva Sutras
Session on: You Are Divinity Part 4
Date : 09 March 2006
Venue : St.Louis, USA

In this video, we see the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam continue his detailed elaboration on the eighth Shiva Sutra. Here, His Divine Holiness talks about how stories can lead you to the truth, as they can create such strong feelings of #devotion within us. We also hear about the significance of history, and the #Puranas in India.
